description:
She was reborn as a wicked woman whose throat was cut at the execution while trying to poison the heroine.

‘This is a chance to survive.’

In order to live, she did not show up in social gatherings and remained silent until the beginning of the original story.

By the way...

I didn’t expect to meet the great villain that I wanted to avoid so much at the first party I attended.

“You’ve taken my first time, so you have to take responsibility for me. ”

I only slept while holding your hand, but now I’m taking responsibility for you?!

“Don’t leave me, Merria.”

Until now.

I tried to break up after pretending to be in a relationship for a while, but why are you so sad?>
